creator: julien.cervelle@univ-mlv.fr
text:
In org.apache.fop.apps.TraxInputStream (and XSLTInputStream), the method
setParameter does nothing since the XMLFilter generated by getXMLFilter does not
use the field transformer, which is not used at all in the class.

creator: glenmazza@yahoo.com
text:
Thanks for bringing this to our attention!  I removed the method from our 1.0 
(development) version. (1.0 does not have TraxInputHandler anymore--so the 
change was applied only to XSLTInputHandler.)

http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/xml-
fop/src/java/org/apache/fop/apps/XSLTInputHandler.java

Just FYI, we're encourging usage of standard JAXP for XSLT translations, all 
our examples presently employ it.  Any usage requiring advanced parser 
configuration should go that route over the XSLTInputHandler wrapper.

Glen
batch transition pre-FOP1.0 resolved+fixed bugs to closed+fixed
creator: gadams@apache.org
